task.summary: Default task
Setup + got basic client/server to work
removed some stuff
Now takes a defult IP - to test on mutiple computers
33 fps
repush - no changes
Disconnect, partly.
Temporaly removed disconnect, and added application class.
Now with Defult gui (shows info, allows to connect to any port/ip)
minimize frame on incoming Connection, close information frame when connecting to server.
Implemented Verification. form fields can not be changed.
Implemented Verification. form fields can not be changed.
Refactoring - Easy to add new Fields.
Refactoring - user can no specify name, pass, and port.
GUI error msg, currently only on missing server
GUI changes, update server status color + a little layout changes
GUI changes, update server status color + a little layout changes
Client can now pause and resume screen share
Clean up, and commenting.
Server can now see a list of connected clients + now its all one JFrame
Server can now kick clients
Client is sent back to start frame, when kicked
bugfix, client can now reconnect after kick.
capturePane actions now changes the window title.
Server is now removes disconnected clients from the list.
Better capture square calculation.
Using MouseAdapter to get selected area
Selection is now shown when server selects view.
removed debuging comment
Package Management
isVerified is not isAuthenticated
small changes Error msg calls.
bugfix, dont open dialogbox when restarting server
Removed print outs.
Removed preferred Size
Uses Constants class
Now uses a class for all constants
Removed the last prints.
Now allows client to disconnect from server
Server now detects when client disconnects, and removes from the list
bugfix, capture pane now cast exeption before making changes to the gui
Client now sends mouse coordinates to the server, and server receives them.
Method for all recived mouseevents
Client can not control servers's computer
Server now decides whether to allow/decline clients request to control
Now draws a cursor on the image
Now draws a cursor on the image
